speaker: IAGO
text_entry: Enter a Herald with a proclamation; People following

speaker: Herald
text_entry: It is Othello's pleasure, our noble and valiant

speaker: Herald
text_entry: general, that, upon certain tidings now arrived,

speaker: Herald
text_entry: importing the mere perdition of the Turkish fleet,

speaker: Herald
text_entry: every man put himself into triumph; some to dance,

speaker: Herald
text_entry: some to make bonfires, each man to what sport and

speaker: Herald
text_entry: revels his addiction leads him: for, besides these

speaker: Herald
text_entry: beneficial news, it is the celebration of his

speaker: Herald
text_entry: nuptial. So much was his pleasure should be

speaker: Herald
text_entry: proclaimed. All offices are open, and there is full

speaker: Herald
text_entry: liberty of feasting from this present hour of five

speaker: Herald
text_entry: till the bell have told eleven. Heaven bless the

speaker: Herald
text_entry: isle of Cyprus and our noble general Othello!
